column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////As a rare visitor to Chicago from a city not known for its Italian
column2: it would be easy for a deep dish to fail to live up to my dreams. However
column3: my sausage-spinach mix pizza was nothing short of perfection. The crust was sweet and buttery
column4: the cheese generous but not overwhelming the rest of the pizza
column5: and the ingredients fresh. To top it off
column6: the creative and scrumptious deep dish cookie smothered in ice cream was flawless in taste and presentation.
